member.name: M:Twilio.TwilioCapability.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new TwilioCapability token generator for Twilio Client
member.param: Your Twilio Account SID from your account dashboard
Your Twilio Auth Token from your account dashboard

member.name: M:Twilio.TwilioCapability.AllowClientIncoming(System.String)
member.summary: Allow the Twilio Client device to receive incoming calls with the specified client name

member.name: M:Twilio.TwilioCapability.AllowClientOutgoing(System.String)
member.summary: Allow the Twilio Client device to place outgoing calls to the specified Application.
member.param: The Twilio Application SID to connect to.

member.name: M:Twilio.TwilioCapability.AllowClientOutgoing(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Allow the Twilio Client device to place outgoing calls to the specified Application.
member.param: The Twilio Application SID to connect to.
Optional data to send with the request to your application

member.name: M:Twilio.TwilioCapability.GenerateToken
member.summary: Generate the token as a string with the default TTL of 3600 seconds.

member.name: M:Twilio.TwilioCapability.GenerateToken(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate the token as a string with a custom TTL value (max 24 hours)
member.param: The lifespan of the token, in seconds
